channel.title: [PI] How To Change Items Price
channel.description: I was wondering how I change how many pk pts an item costs.

item.title: [PI] How To Change Items Price
item.dc:creator: @EzioAuditori EzioAuditori

this is wrong this is how it goes go to source>date>cfg>prices(text document)

find the item id and change the second code like

1 200
No you are wrong, if you read his post he was asking how to change how many pk points an item costs.
change red 1[/quote]

item.title: [PI] How To Change Items Price
item.dc:creator: @EzioAuditori EzioAuditori
item.description:
@EzioAuditori wrote:

Fringe Division:

open up your source and go in to server/model/shops then open up ShopAssistant.java and search “public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {” under that you will see like case 1234 return 1233123 ok the case is the item id and the return is the point cost.

to be more clear…

open up your source and go in to

then open up

and search

under that you will see like

case 1234: return 123;

ok the case is the item id and the return is the point cost.

Read full topic
